text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
Alrighty, let's get to work on a plan for the café! 
Close your eyes… Imagine it! First off―

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
We'll be making the lovely sort of café you admire. 
So we gotta go all in with the things you want to do!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
Ryan, you're… the slightly more mature "Master Mejiro Ryan" 
now, so you gotta straighten up and look the part♪

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: S-straighten up…? Let's see… SweeTea's Master would be… something like this?

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
Awesome! On to the next idea! You'll have the café's bright 
postergirl working with you! Who's that gonna be～……?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
That uhh… heheh… 
I'd like that to be you of course.

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
Yay! Seal of approval! 
Well then, next we—

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: Maarvelooouus!☆★

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Whoa, Marvelous!?

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: Mmmm～☆ Me too! I'm joining in～★ I wanna make everyone marvelous at a cozy café～☆

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text:
Ahaha, full of energy again aren't you, Marvelous! 
Oh…? You ran into Ryan and Ines?

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text: Whoa～! A café, huh!

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text:
Then more people wouldn't hurt, right? 
Ryan! I'll help make your dream come true!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
Ooh, I will too. A café means you likely want help with food? 
Let's make some fluffy memories together♪

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
Eh— Y-you two… really!? 
But surely you're all busy…!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Ryan!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Hweh?! Yes?!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
I'm pretty sure we all know our circumstances when we say 
we'll help out. Go on, take a good look at everyone's faces.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
… You're right. Thank you, everyone. 
I'll be counting on you for the next little while!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
Alrighty then, here's everyone's roles! 
Pâtissier: Akebono!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: Okay♪

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
The twin, or in our case the twin-themed, 
floor staff: Biko and Marvelous!

text_block_list.name: Biko & Marvelous
text_block_list.text: 'Kaay!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Mmm, great to see you so chipper♪ Last up then… I'll be the poster girl, and our barista will be Master Ryan!

text_block_list.name: Café Owner
text_block_list.text:
Oooh, now this is a nice atmosphere! 
… Ahh, that's right! Ryan, dear.

text_block_list.name: Café Owner
text_block_list.text:
A little advice, as your senior in life and café! 
You should start with a concept.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: … A concept?

text_block_list.name: Café Owner
text_block_list.text:
Yes. For example, "I want customers to come by to change 
into work mode in the mornings" or "A cozy café where you 
could even come to relax with a baby."

text_block_list.name: Café Owner
text_block_list.text:
A concept like that will guide you forward. 
"What do I want to accomplish through this café?".

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
……! T-that I already know! 
I—

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: … I want to be like the Master at a café that I admire.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
Like… welcome and serve guests at the counter. 
Ahh, I'm studying up on coffee as well. And…

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Hehe. And in particular you want to give love advice, like SweeTea's Master, right?!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Huh?! I-I feel like that's a little too early for me…

text_block_list.name: Café Owner
text_block_list.text:
Ahaha, I think that's fine. It's almost Valentine's Day, so I'm 
sure the demand for your ideal café is growing out there.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
R-Really…? 
Then… ehehe.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
(… And so, we prepared hard together, and our 
first day at the café was upon us at last.)
